abilities.desc: Your Throws may target any number of enemies within range.
After you perform an Action that inflicted Forced Movement on any enemies, you deal 1 damage to each enemy moved by that Action.
abilities.trigger: after you perform an action that inflicted forced movement on any enemies

actions.name: Gate Guardian
actions.desc: Pull 2 to all enemies you can see, then deal 1 damage to each enemy within range.

actions.name: Watch Your Step
actions.desc:
Target an enemy you can see that moved during this turn.
You Push 1 and deal 2 damage to them.
